markdownRemark.html:
Hi, I’m Nicolas Bontempo! I’m a software engineer, currently working with TrainerRoad.

I created this space as an experimental ground to develop my ideas and share them with others. I started writing in Portuguese, after a few years changed my mind and started writing in English because, in that way, I could improve my English and have a more broad audience.

I’m on an eternal learning path and you can follow my journey.
